posts.post_content:
Well basically its a sorcery speed [plummet](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=plummet) that can chump block for a turn, for ![3](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=3&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol). 6 mana is bonkers for a 3/3, but when you have no other plays its better then nothing.  
  
I think its better then the rating suggests, but still not that great. 2/5
